column4: This enemy does not take damage unless you play a card that wasn't originally in your starting deck during the match.
After the first match, if you do not complete the section, a random card on your team is captured and this enemy is defeated.
Look up the card stats on snap.fan. The card in on your team with the highest win% (in deck) is captured. This enemy has 1 max HP.
If you lose a match, eliminate a card in your deck.
After the first match, a random card in a losing location is wounded.
If this enemy snaps (and the snap takes effect), a random card in your deck is wounded.
After each match, randomize the current location, capturing all stationed cards.
This enemy's primary effect is negated.
If this enemy is defeated, it revives with half its original HP (rounded up).
When one of your cards would be captured or wounded, it is sent away to a random world instead.
The first time you skip this section, draft a card. If you challenge this section, wound a random card on your team.
After the fourth match, if you have not completed this section, stationed cards here are eliminated.
If this enemy wins a location using a token, one of your cards there is captured at the end of the match.
Each time you retreat, this enemy heals 1 HP.
If you defeat this enemy, you may heal a card on your team.
After each match, a card in your deck is wounded. You may eliminate a card on your team to remove this effect.
This enemy takes -1 damage.
This enemy takes -1 damage unless there is a card with negative power on the field at the end of the match.
No Enemy Effect.
If you win a match without snapping, receive the penalty as if you lost.
You must station twice as many cards here.
Stationed cards here are sent away. (You do not need to station more cards).
This enemy has 2 max HP. You may not add cards from the bottom half of your team (sorted by name) to your deck.
After each match, roll a d8. If it is 3 or less, no damage is dealt and no penalties occur. This boss takes x2 damage.
This enemy gains a random secondary effect, in addition to its original effect.
This enemy gains 9 bonus HP. This bonus is reduced by the POW of your stationed card(s) here.
After each match, wound a random card on your field with 0 or less power.
No cards in your deck can share the same cost and POW.
After each match (unless you complete the section), this enemy takes 1 damage and wounds a random card in your deck.
This enemy does not take damage unless you have a token on your field at the end of the match.
If you reveal the first card this match, that card is wounded.
Target a random card on your team. If it has less than 6 POW, send it away.
Target a random card on your team. That card cannot be added to your deck this match.
Randomize the current location, returning any stationed cards to your team.

column2: Nico Minoru: Copy Card to Hand
column4: Target a random card on your team. It must be added to your deck next match.
This enemy captures/eliminates twice as many cards this match.
No Enemy Effect.
